title.rendered: “Israeli Fighter Jets Thwart Hezbollah Missile Launch in Southern Lebanon: An Inside Look”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Documentation: Fighter jets attacked ready-to-launch launchers of the terror organization Hezbollah in southern Lebanon.

A short while ago, fighter jets attacked two launchers of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the area of ​​Ayta al-Shaab in southern Lebanon. As a result of the attack, launches and secondary explosions were identified from the launcher, indicating the presence of missiles in the launcher ready for launch.

Earlier today, a number of launches were identified crossing from Lebanon towards several areas in the north of the country, no casualties.

Attached is documentation of the attack on the launchers: https://bit.ly/3JVP9Ul
